jobDescription: Build modern, cutting-edge solutions & products for Godrej Capital. Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve software and new user-facing features in products. Build scalable, fast and modular web applications using AWS services. Build modern, responsive and fast UI. Learn and adopt new technologies, upgrade skills for changing technological needs of Godrej Capital. Work closely with Senior Devs, App owners and business teams to understand the functional requirements & derive NFRs (Non-functional requirements).
